State.Author: B42 Team and fantastic Fallout New Vegas community
State.Description:
Adds descriptions to all items in the game. For extra roleplaying experience.

This mod is community-driven and is part of the Project B42

Contributions are welcome!
State.Name: B42 Descriptions aka Pip-Info

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Desolation isn't a flora mod that aims to beautify your game, or make it realistic. This flora only emboldens the imagery of a world that hasn't had the chance or good fortune to recover.
State.Name: Desolation Flora

State.Author: Fallout2AM
State.Description: A mod which allows custom hair / eyes / race mods to live happy all together, without conflicting
State.Name: Hair Patcher Two

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: Work for Bobby Bass as a contract killer in this fully-voiced quest mod! Tiddies and biscuits.
State.Name: New Vegas Killer LE

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper - Balebandro
State.Description: Redesigned Quarries does what it says on the tin. This mod gives all quarries in New Vegas a complete and total facelift with working LODs, new meshes, and landscape repaints.
State.Name: Redesigned Quarries

State.Author: BaronVonChateau
State.Description: A Dlc-sized Quest Mod with more than 2000 pro-voiced lines. Delve into a centuries-old library inhabited by sentient machines, and solve Hypatia's mysteries. Five different endings, unique O.S.T.
State.Name: Autumn Leaves

State.Author: Freeman
State.Description: Ever felt that goodsprings felt empty? If you did this mod is for you!
State.Name: Goodsprings remaster

State.Author: weijiesen
State.Description: Professional quality Ballistic VFX overhaul. Bullet Holes match ammo, casings match ammo, new custom particle effects impacts.
State.Name: IMPACT

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: An NVSE-powered plugin that is designed to manage and maintain all UI/HUD extensions added to the game by various mods. Once installed, UIO will ensure UI extensions are always properly installed and, when necessary, properly removed; it will automatically detect, resolve and prevent UI-related issues, and will help keep the game's UI intact.
State.Name: UIO - User Interface Organizer

State.Author: Memphisfml
State.Description: A set of themes created in the Style of Windows 11. Featuring 3 Themes with a clean and consistent look Aswell as custom Icons.
State.Name: Fluency Themes for Mod Organizer 2

State.Author: StevenNightfall and MystiriousDawn
State.Description: 4K photoscanned terrain. rocks, and trees for Tale of Two Wastelands. Lore friendly color palette and placement. 2K and 1K support.
State.Name: 4K Capital Wastescape

State.Author: StevenNightfall and MystiriousDawn
State.Description: 4K photoscanned terrain. rocks, and trees for Tale of Two Wastelands. Lore friendly color palette and placement. 2K and 1K support.
State.Name: 4K Capital Wastescape

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Atmospheres is a weather and lighting mod designed to look beautiful while adding a touch or realism all in one simple plugin. With remade imagespaces and a plethora of new hand-crafted weathers for your Mojave, this mod is sure to improve the visual fidelity of your game.
State.Name: Atmospheres - Weather and Lighting

State.Author: WebbProductions2020 Sweet6Shooter and many others
State.Description: Hello folks!!! The mod that you have all waited for around a year for is finally out. With over 32 weapons added to your New Vegas game the possibilities are endless.
State.Name: Classic Fallout Weapons Remastered

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.
State.Name: Consistent Pip-Boy Icons

State.Author: Anro
State.Description: Making Controller a less frustating Experience.
State.Name: Controller Tweaks

State.Author: Drumber
State.Description: Overhaul of characters in Fallout with new headmeshes, high resolution texture maps and a lot more.
State.Name: Fallout Character Overhaul

Original.Name: 1. FNV Clean Animations - .357 Magnum Revolver (Blended Locomotion)-79134-1-0-1669756901.rar

State.Description: Full reanimation of the .357 Magnum Revolver. Uses and requires kNVSE.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - .357 Magnum Revolver

Original.Name: 1. FNV Clean Animations - Part 2 - Blended Locomotion-78335-1-0-1662826658.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Collects all post-Part 1 animations into a single download. Makes revisions, tweaks, and edits where necessary. Adds a bonus set: the Grenade Machinegun. Comes bundled with Iron Sight alignment fixes.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Part 2

State.Author: Freeman
State.Description: Freeside Is Fremont not the projects. its still a ghetto though
State.Name: Freeside Reloaded Project

Original.Name: Titans of The New West 2.0 Patch-77098-1-01-1668607395.7z

State.Author: Frozen - Visualcore
State.Description: I dreamed all my life of a sexy walking animation in New Vegas so I had to do it myself. Animations are applied to the female player character and female NPCs.
State.Name: Frozen 3rd Person Feminine Movement

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora
State.Description: Not cars
State.Name: B42 Bows

State.Author: emoose
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that almost completely fixes the exterior lighting bug, and allows up to 4x the number of active lights!
State.Name: Improved Lighting Shaders

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Legacy Reborn aims to overhaul all landscape (and more) textures across both Fallout 3 and New Vegas, while retaining their vanilla essence.
State.Name: Legacy Reborn Texture Pack

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description:
Engine bugfixes, optional tweaks and new features with no performance impact. Fully customisable via in-game menu and INIs. 

Includes Inventory Searching, Cookable Grenades, Manual Reload, Smooth Aiming, WASD Menu Support and more. 

Fully compatible with TTW and The Frontier.
State.Name: lStewieAl's Tweaks and Engine Fixes

Original.Name: NMCs Texture Pack LARGE Pack SINGLE FILE FOR NMM -12056-1-0.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description:
NeilMc_NMC's Global texture pack for Fallout 3. Does not cover the DLC. Replaces Terrain, trees, interiors/ exteriors, and most vehicles and furniture with high resolution (200-400%) real-life photograph-based equivalents. Now in FOUR Sizes to suit your PC.



Now with added NMM compatibility!
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_for_FO3

Original.Name: NMCs Textures NV LARGE Pack Part 2 of 3 FOR NMM -43135-1-0.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

Original.Name: NMCs Textures NV LARGE Pack Part 3 of 3 FOR NMM-43135-1-0.7z

State.Author: NeilMc_NMC
State.Description: Fallout New Vegas Texture pack by NeilMc_NMC: re-textures roads, trees, landscape, vehicles buildings and interiors with high-resolution photographic based equivalent textures. Global texture replacer. Does not retexture the DLC.
State.Name: NMCs_Texture_Pack_For_New_Vegas

State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.

State.Author: vurt and hadesTTW
State.Description: A conversion of Vurt's FO3 Flora Overhaul for TTW 3.3.2 by hadesTTW. Includes the Forested, Dead, and Total Devastation versions.
State.Name: TTW DC Flora Overhaul

State.Author: Anro
State.Description: Allow to Create MCM Menu trough a INI
State.Name: UX Toolkit

State.Author: vurt and Marcurios
State.Description: 100+ new desert types of trees and plants. 3D LODS! Better looking grass. New terrain textures (optional).
State.Name: Wasteland Flora and Terrain Overhaul

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: Sorting mod, using features of yUI to make inventory management a better experience.
State.Name: ySI - Sorting Ycons

State.Author: Jackson Elhage
State.Description: Replace the ugly 2D rain found in Zion Canyon (as well as most weather mods) with a new 3D version. Rain no longer looks weird when you look up or down.
State.Name: 3D Rain

State.Author: Hitman47101
State.Description: Threw everything I had into one pack to celebrate 10 years of... this.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack

State.Author: Hitman47101 and Uploader
State.Description: Fixed camera jumps, animation snapping, movement lock, broken aim in 3rd person.
State.Name: Anniversary Anim Pack - General Bugfix

State.Author: Quicksilver500
State.Description: Allows you to holster up to 4 weapons on your body at once. Allows you to holster any weapon type in any of four locations on your body. No compatibility patches required.  No biped slots used. Adds visible holsters to weapons.
State.Name: Armed to the Teeth - Redux

State.Author: B42
State.Description: A mod that adds melee attacks for non-melee weapons, similar to melee hits and buttstrokes in modern FPS games.
State.Name: B42 Melee Bash

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora and Hitman47101
State.Description:
This mod adds brand new, modern throwing weapons mechanic, as seen in Metro, COD, Fallout 4 and some other FPS games.

The aim was to make it look and feel like it was always in the game.

This mod is part of the Project B42
State.Name: B42 Quickthrow - an alternative grenade hotkey mod

State.Author: rm rf
State.Description: This mod makes weapon wheel in "Just Assorted Mods" (or "Just Weapon Wheel") much cleaner to look. Based on "Clean Companion Wheel" by ItsMeJesusHChrist.
State.Name: Clean Just Weapons Wheel

State.Author: LTAM
State.Description: This is a collection of every Classic Fallout Weapons Remastered weapon icon I re-made in the style of Consistent Pip-man Icons.
State.Name: CFWR x consistent pip-man icons - Classic Weapons icons

State.Author: ItsMeJesusHChrist also known as LOC or The Icon Guy
State.Description: This is a lore-friendly, mostly hand-drawn, total overhaul mod that tweaks around 3600 icons which made them immersively more consistent in terms of coloring and transparency. There are other bug fixes too, and many new details! Okay, just write that in the brief overview, it's not that hard.

State.Description: Travel the Mojave with a trusty, compact campsite to act as a portable player home.
State.Name: Desert Nomad - Simple Portable Camping

State.Description: An updated version of Dracomies' New Vegas Redesigned 3, based off the work of Qwinn's revised mod.

State.Description: Adds helmet overlays similar to those found in various S.T.A.L.K.E.R. mods.

State.Description: Higher resolution versions of JIP companions command and control's icons.

A collection of my mods, merged for convenience. 

Requires JIP LN NVSE and JohnnyGuitar NVSE.

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: An addon designed to be used with the Legacy Reborn texture pack. This replaces the stock Legacy Reborn rock textures with something more stylized and faithful to the real world Mojave desert.

State.Description: A overhaul of the Gameplay UI

State.Author: TheKraken
State.Description: Replaces many of "JIP Companions Command and Control"'s icons. The original icons are low resolution with weird colors and fov. These replacement icons are stylized after the perk images and blend in with the rest of the UI much better.

State.Description: No ESP. Makes Qolore's Simple Interior Lighting Overhaul not break the TTW intro or Tranquility Lane interiors.

Chop, slice, and bludgeon that Pete.

State.Description: Hidden Valley: Overhauled is a comprehensive, lore-friendly rework of the lighting and atmosphere of the Brotherhood of Steel's Hidden Valley Bunker that aims to better realise the potential of the location while staying true to Obsidian's vision.

State.Description: The vanilla water towers are crusty. Get that shit outta yo game.

Clean up, restore power and water, salvage furniture, and purchase or scavenge powerful upgrades for your home.

State.Description: Displays remaining duration of consumed Aid items on the HUD.

State.Author: jazzisparis and LuthienAnarion
State.Description:
This plugin is an extension of the New Vegas Script Extender (NVSE). It adds 1000+ new functions, which can be used in GECK scripting and (in some cases) as conditions.

Additionally, this mod includes numerous engine bug fixes/tweaks, and restores several broken game features.

State.Description: Adds "New" 10 Female and 4 Male haircuts.  The aim of the mod, as the name suggests, is to expand quite slim selection of hairstyles provided by the vanilla game. Small clippings and seams are to be expected, but hey, it doesnt get any more vanilla than that. Hats and glasses should work, but exactly how good they work i'll leave to your judgment.

State.Author: kabyidon
State.Description: This mod aims to build on top of existing mods to add an integrated backpack system into New Vegas. It is completely customizable, thanks to INI functions and JIP LN ScriptRunner.
State.Name: CIBS - Customizable Integrated Backpack System (now with JIP LN Script Runner)

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Full reanimation of the Marksman Carbine. Uses and requires kNVSE.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Marksman Carbine

State.Author: jazzisparis
State.Description: This mod is designed to revolutionize the way companions are controlled and interacted with, rendering the companion-wheel obsolete and bringing new elements of team-work and tactics, with the intention of making the game look and feel more as a proper role-playing game than as an action-shooter.
State.Name: JIP Companions Command and Control

State.Author: Made by ElPascal - v1 61 kindly provided by Kazopert
State.Description: This mod adds hundreds of npcs and several scripted events to the world of Fallout: New Vegas; people patrolling the roads, traveling between towns, occupying locations, exploring the desert and reacting dynamically to your choices throughout the game. The Mojave will never feel empty again.
State.Name: The Living Desert - Travelers Patrols Consequences Increased Population and more

State.Author: Slippy
State.Description: Returns the junk items you would logically get from ingesting things like cans of food and lunchbox meals.
State.Name: Food Scraps

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora
State.Description:
Notifications! Or, in other words, shows more than one message at a time! Omg it's just like Skyrim! ©

Also download bows: https://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/79786
State.Name: B42 Notify - Corner Messages Overhaul - ESPless

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Collects all post-Part 1 animations into a single download. Makes revisions, tweaks, and edits where necessary. Adds a bonus set: the Grenade Machinegun. Comes bundled with Iron Sight alignment fixes.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Part 2

State.Author: jsawyer - Roy Batty
State.Description: TTW version of jsawyers mod, tweaked for TTW and uploaded with permission from Josh Sawyer.
State.Name: SawyerBatty

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Enables Hardcore mode and disables the selection message.
State.Name: Hardcore Forever

State.Author: LogicDragon
State.Description: This is a NVSE plugin that enables a visible body and player shadows when in first person. Also, any points where the game force switches to 3rd person (sitting/knockout/death, etc.) are now in 1st person.
State.Name: New Vegas - Enhanced Camera

State.Author: pintocat
State.Description:
Trade in all Caps at once.

Trade in all Legion money at once.

Trade in all NCR money at once.

Trade in all Pre-war money at once.

Trade in all Caps, Legion, NCR, Pre-war money at once.

Trade in all Legion, NCR, Pre-war money at once.



Optional console command in-game that removes the pre-war money.
State.Name: Casino Exchange All

State.Author: hman101
State.Description:
Adds Skrim-esque weapon displays.



Fully compatible with weapons from all the DLC and weapons added by other mods.



Contains patches for TTW and modded player homes
State.Name: Dynamic Weapon Displays

State.Author: CarlZee
State.Description: Adds a repeatable Courier Delivery Service quest to Primm, with time limits, random encounters, toll booths and more!
State.Name: Mojave Express Courier Delivery Work - Primm

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: A small mod that overhauls the previously lackluster and boring Nipton Pit Stop.
State.Name: Nipton Solitare Garage (Location Remake)

State.Author: Roni
State.Description: A simple, modern "flashlight" mod, created using JIP NVSE functionality. Now configurable and compatible with Enhanced Camera. Optionally replaces the Pip-Boy light.
State.Name: Pointlight Flashlight (and Piplight)

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
Full animation overhaul for the Varmint Rifle.



Nexus: fix your text editor.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Varmint Rifle

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Replaces all of the games metal barrel props with higher quality models and textures.
State.Name: HQ Metal Barrels

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description:
Adds an MCM menu with options for adjust World Field of View, Player Field of View, Pipboy Field of View and Terminal Screen Field of View.

Also allows adjusting the Scope Scissor Amount, Weapon FOV Ratio, FOV Zoom time, Dialogue Zoom time and Dialogue delay time.
State.Name: FOV Slider

State.Author: Wastelandloner - Roy Batty
State.Description: Adds 40+ locations to the DC Wasteland, compatible with TTW Interiors, AWOP4FO3 and The Regulators.
State.Name: TTW Another Interior Mod

State.Author: llamaRCA and Nivea
State.Description: Willow is not the usual girl companion. She is a story-driven character with over 1200 lines of voiced dialogue. She enriches your gameplay experience with her complex companion behaviors and her responses to the gameworld.
State.Name: Willow - A Better Companion Experience

Original.Name: 1. FNV Clean Animations - Caravan Shotgun (Blended Locomotion)-76718-1-1-1-1653941080.rar

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: A set of unnecessarily detailed Caravan Shotgun animations some of you might want to use.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Caravan Shotgun

State.Author: weijiesen - darthbdaman
State.Description:
Replacement main plugin for IMPACT, that automatically patches all weapons in the game, DLC, and mods, to have the appropriate Shell Casings and Impact Data Sets based on their ammo types. Work with all weapons that use vanilla or DLC ammo lists or ammo types.



Includes scripted compatibility for companion weapons and NPC ammo types.
State.Name: IMPACT - Compatibility Edition (JIP LN) (DLC - TTW - All Mods)

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Gives the Lucky 38 smooth balls.
State.Name: Lucky 38's Smooth Balls

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description:
FNV Clean Animations, now featuring good idles and remade animations.



Brand new + revised animation sets for various weapons from FNV/TTW. Includes various fix, features, and tweaks to upgrade the original Part 1 and bring it up to speed.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Reborn - Part 1

State.Author: Pelinor
State.Description: Allows any number of mods to be configured from a single menu.
State.Name: The Mod Configuration Menu

State.Author: iranrmrf
State.Description: This plugin fixes the Fallout New Vegas mod limit bug. It allows a maximum of 255 plugins to be loaded. It can also cause an increase in fps, remove game stutter and allow for faster loading times especially when using a large number of mods.
State.Name: FNV Mod Limit Fix

Original.Name: Insignia of the Brotherhood - Hidden Valley Overhauled-74057-0-2-1634587477.zip

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: The Brotherhood of Steel will now proudly display a metal cast insignia on the wall of their bunker, not just a simple junk totem.
State.Name: Insignia of the Brotherhood

State.Author: LTAM
State.Description: A retexture of the bow perk for B42 bows to fit with CPI icons
State.Name: B42 Bows x consistent pip-man icons - Bow Perk Icon

Original.Name: TTW - Dexter's Megaton Player Home Reno-73897-1-2-1669832032.zip

State.Author: DexMods
State.Description: Remodel of the player home in Megaton. Interactable with several unlockables and a handful of upgrades. TTW version.
State.Name: TTW - Dexter's Megaton Player Home Reno

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Adds a bottlecaps counter on the HUD inspired by the F04 mod of the same name (which is itself inspired by a F76 feature).
State.Name: HUD Caps for FNV

State.Author: Freeman
State.Description: This is complete remaster of Primm
State.Name: Primm Remaster

State.Author: S6S and Clavyn and Mr Shersh
State.Description:
This mod adds hitstop for melee weapons, by slowing down gametime to .1 for a few frames, then restoring it. Sounds still play normally, and the frame delay before returning to full speed is configurable.

You can also have a small image modifier applied with some blur to make the effect more prominent.
State.Name: Melee Hitstop Effects

State.Author: Stentorious
State.Description: Adds B42 Dropmag functionality to Tale of Two Wastelands.
State.Name: B42 Dropmag TTW Patch

State.Author: Queue
State.Description: Implements structured exception handling and sanity checking to reduce frequency of game crashes.
State.Name: NVAC - New Vegas Anti Crash

State.Author: Roni
State.Description: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks makes changes to Image Spaces and Lighting Templates to give interiors a more dynamic and atmospheric look.
State.Name: Atmospheric Lighting Tweaks (FNV and TTW)

State.Author: Someguy
State.Description: This is the master file required for all of Someguy2000's quest mods.
State.Name: The Someguy Series

State.Author: nickheggo HULKHOD3N
State.Description: Replaces the vanilla footstep sounds with way more realistic sounding ones, as well as adding over 60 additional sounds and fixing some engine issues.
State.Name: Project Reality Footsteps FNV

State.Author: DavidJCobb and llde
State.Description: A DLL that logs raw crash data -- the instruction pointer, x86 register values, and an attempt at identifying the source DLL (and instruction pointer relative to its module base).
State.Name: Crash Logger

State.Author: Carxt - Tgspy - lStewieAl
State.Description: The newest generation in performance enhancement and stutter fixing. Windows 10 compatible. Featuring fixes to the dreaded micro stutter, and a high FPS Havok fix.
State.Name: NVTF - New Vegas Tick Fix

State.Author: Xilandro Axeuora and Hitman47101
State.Description:
This mod adds brand new, modern throwing weapons mechanic, as seen in Metro, COD, Fallout 4 and some other FPS games.

The aim was to make it look and feel like it was always in the game.

This mod is part of the Project B42
State.Name: B42 Quickthrow - an alternative grenade hotkey mod

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Restores the opening and closing gates to various settlements in the Capital Wasteland.
State.Name: Auto Gates Redux

State.Author: shad0wshayd3
State.Description: Delay DLC for FNV and TTW 3.3, remade from the ground up
State.Name: Delay DLC Redux

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Replaces the atrocious desert overpass seen just past Wolfhorn Ranch.
State.Name: Desert Bridges (Location Remake)

State.Author: Nucleoprotein AKA virusek - Wall_SoGB
State.Description: Truly updated OneTweak.
State.Name: OneTweak but Really Updated

State.Author: lStewieAl - Hitman47101
State.Description: Aim down sights without the camera snapping to place. Engine plugin, no esps or animation files - compatible with all animation mods.
State.Name: Smooth True Iron Sights Camera

State.Author: doodlez karut FadingSignal
State.Description: Rain fixes and improvements powered by Climate Control NVSE. Supports 3D Rain.
State.Name: Climate Control - Rain

State.Author: Xilandro - master JazzIsParis - DarianStephens
State.Description: This mod adds weapon inertia. Part of Project B42. Thanks to JazzIsMagic... I mean Paris. ;)
State.Name: B42 Weapon Inertia

Original.Name: TTW FCO Companions NPCs and Races-59850-.zip

State.Author: Nexnarck
State.Description:
TTW and FCO 2 required!



A little replacer for majority of NPCs throughout the wastes.
State.Name: TTW FCO 2.0 NPC Overhaul

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: A Tweaks .ini with just the essential bugfix and quality-of-life settings enabled, hand-picked by the GOAT himself
State.Name: Stewie Tweaks Essentials INI

State.Author: doodlez FadingSignal
State.Description: Interior rain sounds powered by Climate Control NVSE.
State.Name: Interior Rain

State.Author: doodlez karut FadingSignal
State.Description: Rain fixes and improvements powered by Climate Control NVSE. Supports 3D Rain.
State.Name: Climate Control - Rain

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a fully functional post-game world to the game, no longer will you be brought to the credits and end your journey there. Instead, you will realise the consequences of what endings you've gotten and explore a vastly changed world.
State.Name: FPGE - Functional Post Game Ending

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper - PistolPayback
State.Description: A small train station sits across from quarry junction. This station boasts a few visual bugs and a confusing, gross design. This mod aims to fix the flaws of this station well retaining a very vanilla and lore-friendly look.
State.Name: Quarry Junction Station (Location Remake)

State.Author: doodlez Demorome
State.Description: NVSE plugin which adds utilities and bug fixes for weather mods.
State.Name: Climate Control NVSE

State.Author: TommInfinite and everyone he copied code from
State.Description: NVSE plugin which adds new functions and allows modders to easily add new UI elements to the game (HUD Bars).
State.Name: SUP NVSE

Original.Name: Perk Style CCC Icons Modded Companions-75233-1-0-1643864235.zip

State.Author: irondink
State.Description: Inspired by TheIncredibleKraken's Perk Styled CCC Icons, with custom icons made for modded companions!
State.Name: Perk Styled Icons - Modded Companions - Russell - Willow - Niner - Molerat - Hope - MikeBurnFire

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Atom and his divine ways have sent us a gift, my dear flock! Allow his glow to permeate our eyes so that we may see his vision!
State.Name: The Divine Bomb of Atom

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: The last companion you'll ever need.
State.Name: Bad Mothafucka LE

State.Author: Kazopert
State.Description: Adds a functional reputation system to Fallout 3 alike New Vegas.
State.Name: TTW Reputations

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Improves framerate in combat by fixing an engine bug that lowered framerate while attacking an enemy with a health-bar visible.
State.Name: Combat Lag Fix (NVSE)

State.Author: Kormakur
State.Description: xNVSE plugin that enables having custom animations for weapons and actors. Fixes the engine-bound anim group limit problem.
State.Name: kNVSE Animation Plugin

State.Author: B42
State.Description: Dynamically adds ISControl node system animation support + easy per-weapon sights adjustment
State.Name: ISControl Enabler

State.Author: Nehred
State.Description: Fixes a vanilla issue about the Strip lights not showing in certain parts of the map.
State.Name: Strip Lights Region Fix

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description: NVSE plugin that alters the way Global Time Multiplier is modified so to provide better compatibility between mods and base game.
State.Name: yGTM (NVSE)

State.Author: doodlez Demorome
State.Description: NVSE plugin which adds utilities and bug fixes for weather mods.
State.Name: Climate Control NVSE

State.Author: StealthDick
State.Description: Immersively overhaul your fast-travel experience everywhere you go with Transporters! Mod implements an alternative to fast-travel, adds a new faction, a new settlement, a quest, and... Moleholes? Support for Base Game DLC, New Vegas Bounties (I & II), and Tale of Two Wastelands.
State.Name: Transporters - Immersive Fast Travel

State.Author: WilliamSea - Roy Batty
State.Description:
Having joined the Regulators after getting the Lawbringer perk, you notice a computer in the downstairs room. From it, you accept contracts on fugitives and their gangs all over the wasteland. Its time for some wasteland justice!

47 missions with a Perk reward. You can then continue random contracts after you finish the main quests.
State.Name: TTW The Regulators

State.Author: Johnsonn
State.Description: This mod fixes one of the most glaring issues with non-scoped weapons in Fallout New Vegas - their inconsistent accuracy caused by vanilla weapon wobble and bugged character spread setting, MUST HAVE mod for consistent gunplay (reupload).
State.Name: Consistent Spread - Firearms Accuracy and Wobble Fix

Original.Name: New Vegas Bounties I LE TTW-77108-1-4-1676059973.7z

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: Pursue high-risk/high-reward bounties in the first installment of the The Someguy Series.
State.Name: New Vegas Bounties I LE

State.Author: Qwinn - Weijiesen - Dracomies
State.Description: An updated version of Dracomies' New Vegas Redesigned 3, based off the work of Qwinn's revised mod.
State.Name: NVR3R - New Vegas Redesigned 3 Revised

State.Author: germyvis
State.Description: Makes headshots more realistic. Headshots can now be lethal depending on creature type, bullet calibre, and whether it was from a rifle or a pistol. Also contains various options such as headshot sounds and making the player or their companions immune to headshots.
State.Name: Realistic Headshot Damage

State.Author: Danielvt
State.Description: ySI - Categories it's a small addon for ySI - Sorting Ycons that adds new categories to the inventory menu.
State.Name: ySI - Categories

State.Author: Various
State.Description: A skeleton with compatibility for the latest mods
State.Name: NV Compatibility Skeleton

State.Author: Someteam2000
State.Description: The last companion you'll ever need.
State.Name: Bad Mothafucka LE

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Plugin to add clipboard paste support, as well as ctrl left/right and backspace/delete to aid typing in console.
State.Name: Console Paste Support

State.Author: Xilandro x Carxt x JazzIsParis
State.Description: This mod, thanks to JazzIsParis magic, adds diagonal movement. Simple as that.
State.Name: Diagonal movement

State.Author: rockbiter68
State.Description: Collects all post-Part 1 animations into a single download. Makes revisions, tweaks, and edits where necessary. Adds a bonus set: the Grenade Machinegun. Comes bundled with Iron Sight alignment fixes.
State.Name: FNV Clean Animations - Part 2

State.Author: Paspartan1
State.Description: Adds the camping gear from the mod Desert Nomad to the Craterside Supply in Megaton for people that want to start in DC in TTW.
State.Name: Desert Nomad - TTW DC Integration

State.Author: vurt
State.Description:
New lore friendly groundcovers and plants! Including cacti, agave, thistle, yucca, dead flowers, grasses and shrubs.

Default version has hi-res textures but the mod has medium and low-res addons. ini files available.
State.Name: Groundcover Overhaul

State.Author: doodlez FadingSignal
State.Description: Interior rain sounds powered by Climate Control NVSE.
State.Name: Interior Rain

State.Author: Roy Batty
State.Description: Quick start plugin to skip Vault 101 and start in the cave just outside the vault.
State.Name: Tale of Two Wastelands Quick Start

State.Author: Roy Batty - LuthienAnarion
State.Description: Simple patcher to make Fallout New Vegas 4GB Aware. Supports all known Steam and GoG versions. The Bethesda.net and XBOX Game pass versions are NOT supported since NVSE will not support them either.
State.Name: FNV 4GB Patcher

State.Author: anhatthezoo - with help from the xNVSE team
State.Description: Another script extender plugin.
State.Name: AnhNVSE

State.Author: yvileapsis
State.Description:
NVSE plugin that aims to fix UI bugs and add new UI features. 

Sorting Icons and more!
State.Name: yUI - User Ynterface

State.Author: Spiffyskytrooper
State.Description: Replaces the random ruined suburban house at the entrance of Red Rock with a structure that makes a little morse sense given the location.
State.Name: Red Rock Visitor Center (Location Remake)

State.Author: Qolore 7 - Anro24
State.Description: Simple scripted interior lighting overhaul. Automatically works with any mod
State.Name: Simple Interior Lighting Overhaul

State.Author: lStewieAl
State.Description: Integrates character import and export into the character creation menu. Share your designs with others!
State.Name: Character Preset Menu

State.Author: LivewareCascade
State.Description: A lore-friendly and balanced player home/quest mod for TTW that sees you renovate the ruin of the garage at Springvale Red Rocket into a fully functional and capable home for yourself. Clean up, restore power and water, salvage furniture, and purchase or scavenge powerful upgrades for your home.
State.Name: TTW - Springvale Garage

State.Author: BLIGHTENED
State.Description: A complete object overhaul of the infamous Rivet City Hydroponics Bay.
State.Name: Better Rivet City Hydroponics TTW

State.Author: Asterra - lStewieAl
State.Description:
NVSE implementation of Asterra's bugfix for Enhanced Camera. Fixing EC's bug where the player's legs would sink into the ground when switching from first to third-person. 

No esp or performance hit.
State.Name: Enhanced Camera Ground Sink Fix (NVSE)

Original.Name: Titans of The New West 2.0 Patch-77334-1-01-1668205533.7z

State.Author: Frozen - Visualcore
State.Description: Male Movement. Yes :pepeglare:
State.Name: Frozen 3rd Person Masculine Movement
